title: The Fisherman's Wife: Women of the New Testament Novel
description: In a homeland ruled by Rome and torn by unrest, Johannaâ€™s love for Simon, a young fisherman from Capernaum, may not be enough to hold them together. Childless, her society shames her. Rumors of messiahs and rebellion plague their village. After a new rabbi calls Simon away, Johanna must choose what to believe.
author: Dianne G. Sagan
